code: import{useContext}from'react';import'./index.css';import VideoFlipperContext from'../context';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{activeTab,handleTabClick}=useContext(VideoFlipperContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"heading",children:"Cropper"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-groups",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>handleTabClick('editor'),className:`tab ${activeTab==='editor'?'tab-active':''}`,children:"Editor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>handleTabClick('preview'),className:`tab ${activeTab==='preview'?'tab-active':''}`,children:"Recorded Preview"})]})]});};export default Header;
